params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.job_name
params.description: Required. The job name to use for the created job. For update job request, job name should be same as the existing running job.

params.name: data.container_spec
params.description: Spec about the container image to launch.

params.name: data.container_spec_gcs_path
params.description: Cloud Storage path to a file with json serialized ContainerSpec as content.

params.name: data.launch_options
params.description: Launch options for this flex template job. This is a common set of options across languages and templates. This should not be used to pass job parameters.

params.name: data.environment
params.description: The runtime environment for the FlexTemplate job

params.name: data.update
params.description: Set this to true if you are sending a request to update a running streaming job. When set, the job name should be the same as the running job.

params.name: data.transform_name_mappings
params.description: Use this to pass transform_name_mappings for streaming update jobs. Ex:{"oldTransformName":"newTransformName",...}'
